passives.name: Ignore Pain
passives.effects: Reduces {{rd|30%|10%}} of all {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} physical physical damage and magic magic damage damage received and instead stores the damage to successively take it as true damage over 3 seconds, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passives.name: Defy
passives.effects: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 75% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
